title: 9 Days
description: You have 9 Days to explore the vast world to find the best skills and items for the final fight. Choose carefully where you go and how you spend your time. Remember, you only have 9 days. Craft your own style of fighting by mixing different Ki Attacks, Dodges and Melee Strikes together. During the 9th day, the time for exploration is over. You will be confronted by Afran to determine the fate of the world .

system_requirements.Processor: Intel i5-2500k (4 core 3.3 GHz) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 (4 core 3.1 GHz)
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or AMD RX 480
